eu.crismaproject

Class BuildingBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.crismaproject.BuildingBlock

  • public class BuildingBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    This catalogue item represents the description of a Functional Building Block of the CRISMA Framework Architecture.
    Author:
    Pascal Dih√©

    • Field Detail

      • type

        public BuildingBlock.BuildingBlockType[] type
        The type of the Building Block. This is a fixed list of four types described in the CRISMA Framework Architecture. A Building Block may be assigned to two types, e.g. User Interaction and Integration.
        • Infrastructure: Building Block of the CRISMA Core
        • Integration: Building Blocks for Data and Model Integration
        • User Interaction: Graphical User Interface Building Blocks
        • CRISMA Simulation Model: Crisis Management Simulation Models provided by SP4

      • summary

        public java.lang.String summary
        A short description (summary) of this Building Block. It consists of plaintext only and is maximum 3-5 lines long. The summary may automatically be extracted from the description.

      • description

        public java.lang.String description
        The long description of the Building Block. May include formatted text, pictures, etc. The description should describe the key functionality of the Building Block and its position in the CRISMA Framework Architecture.

      • relatedBuildingBlocks

        public BuildingBlock[] relatedBuildingBlocks
        References to related Building Blocks, e.g. if the Building Block is a client of an SP4 Simulation Model, a reference to the respective CRISMA Simulation Model should be provided.

      • softwareComponents

        public SoftwareComponent[] softwareComponents
        Provides references to the Software Components for this Building Block that have been selected, extended or implemented by the CRISMA Consortium. One Building Block may be realised by different Software Components, e.g. for the Data Integration Building Block and the GIS Widget Building Block there exist different implementations that can be used in a CRISMA Application.

      • functionalDescription

        public java.net.URL functionalDescription
        A link to the detailed Functional Description of the Building Block. These documents are currently hosted on the VTT workspace and are visible to registered users only.

      • BuildingBlock

        public BuildingBlock()
